content.en: Plant species classification: Scientists have been exploring the use of algorithms, specifically Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) and other deep learning methods, to classify and identify plant species based on leaf features. These algorithms are able to differentiate between morphologically similar species and can be used for automatic plant image identification. Additionally, researchers have found that combining different algorithms, such as Support Vector Machines (SVM) and Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), can improve the accuracy of plant classification.
content.da: Planteartsklassifikation: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer, specifikt Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) og andre dyb læringsmetoder, til at klassificere og identificere plantearter baseret på bladkarakteristika. Disse algoritmer er i stand til at skelne mellem morfologisk lignende arter og kan bruges til automatisk plantebilledgenkendelse. Desuden har forskere fundet ud af, at kombinationen af forskellige algoritmer, såsom Support Vector Machines (SVM) og Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), kan forbedre nøjagtigheden af planteklassifikation.
